<h1 class=name><a class=text1 href="pronounce">Attila Gyetvai</a></h1>

<center><img class="photo" src="photo.jpg"/></center>

<p class=menu> 
  <a class=text1 href="CV_AttilaGyetvai.pdf">CV</a> &nbsp;&#183;&nbsp;
  <a class=text1 href="mailto:attila.gyetvai@bportugal.pt">attila.gyetvai@bportugal.pt</a>
</p>
<p class=intro>
  I am a Research Economist at the <a class=text1 href="https://www.bportugal.pt/en/economista/attila-gyetvai">Bank of Portugal</a> and also a Research Fellow at <a class=text1 href="https://www.iza.org/person/31081/attila-gyetvai">IZA</a> and at <a class=text1 href="https://kti.krtk.hu/en/">CERS-IE</a>. In Fall 2025, I will join the <a class=text1 href="https://economics.clas.ufl.edu">University of Florida</a> as a Visiting Assistant Professor of Economics. I earned my Ph.D. in Economics from <a class=text1 href="https://econ.duke.edu">Duke University</a> in 2021.
</p>
<p class=intro>
  I co-organize the <a class=text1 href="https://sites.google.com/view/structuralmicroconf/current-edition">Structural Microeconomics Conference</a>. The third edition will be held at Duke in November 2025.
</p>

```{r include=FALSE}
coauthors <- data.frame(
  name = c("Peter Arcidiacono", 
           "Arnaud Maurel", 
           "Maria Zhu", 
           "Katya Jardim",
           "Nasir Hossein Dad",
           "Eugene Tan",
           "Nic Kozeniauskas",
           "Anikó Bíró",
           "István Boza",
           "Dániel Prinz"),
  website = c("http://public.econ.duke.edu/~psarcidi/", 
              "http://www.amaurel.net", 
              "http://www.mariazhu.com", 
              "https://ekaterinajardim.com",
              "https://sites.google.com/view/nasirhosseindad",
              "https://sites.google.com/site/econeugenetan",
              "http://nicjkoz.com",
              "https://sites.google.com/site/aniko17biro/",
              "https://sites.google.com/view/bozaistvan/",
              "http://danielpri.nz")
)
link <- paste0("<a href=\"", coauthors$website, "\" class=text2><u>",coauthors$name,"</u></a>")
coauthors <- cbind(coauthors, link)
row.names(coauthors) <- coauthors$name
```
